titleStmt.title: A publication by the counsell of Virginea, touching the plantation there
titleStmt.author: Counseil for Virginia (England and Wales)
Virginia Company of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Haueland for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
